name: SEPARATE HEARTS
description:
Separate Hearts: A Love Story of Separation

SEPARATE HEARTS -: A LOVE STORY OF SPARATION, (JUST A PROTOTYPE) GAME MADE FOR A GDEVLOP #3 GAME JAM 

SORRY FOR THE ART, MY ARTIST IS STICK,

SO ENJOY CONTROLS ARE - 

*LEFT ARROW - FOR MOVING LEFT

*RIGHT ARROW - FOR MOVING RIGHT

*SPACE - FOR JUMP

* "F" KEY - FOR FIREING BULLETS

AND ALSO I DONT WANT TO WIN PRIZES, I WANT ONLY GIENUNE FEEDBACK FROM YOU GUYS.

THIS IS MY VERY 2ND GAME OF MY CARRER, SO DONT MIND.
